title: Behold Esports - Recruiting Gold top laner for Iron to Gold tournaments
body:
Currently looking for a gold top laner to become starting top for Behold Esports Red and go through an application process
Must have 
- Clear communication ( Decent quality mic) 
- Available to play actively in tournaments scrims and practice  
- Must be looking to improve at the game
Benefits of joining us 
- RP prizes for winning or placing in tournament
- Great team environment for everyone to learn and improve together
- Meet some great lads and have some good banter 

Add me on Discord Havoc#4859
-Cheers
